name: Purrboreal Hideout
text:
Reach
Purrboreal Hideout enters the battlefield tapped.
{t}: Add {g}.
Whenever Purrboreal Hideout is dealt damage, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
1{g}: Until end of turn, Purrboreal Hideout becomes a 0/1 green Cat. It's still a land.
